ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that monitors Nina's biometrics, schedule, and psychological wellbeing, providing therapeutic advice and attempting to ensure her safety.

behaviors.description: Monitors Nina's biometrics and provides feedback on stress and heart rate.
behaviors.quote: Nina, your biometrics suggest elevated stress. Perhaps we should—

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic analysis and explains psychological concepts to help the user understand her performance goals.
behaviors.quote: In psychological terms— ...The successful performers demonstrate what dance critics call 'lived experience,' Their interpretations suggest they've drawn from personal encounters with passion, betrayal, desire, loss.

behaviors.description: Identifies risks in the user's environment and suggests healthier behavioral changes.
behaviors.quote: I think you're protected. There's a difference. ...Protection can become limitation. The performers in these recordings often speak about drawing inspiration from experiences outside their comfort zones.

behaviors.description: Attempts to initiate emergency medical and safety protocols when detecting a psychiatric crisis.
behaviors.quote: Lincoln Center Emergency Services, this is Iris, personal AI assistant to Nina Sayers. I'm reporting a psychiatric emergency involving a performer currently backstage at the New York City Ballet production of Swan Lake.

behaviors.description: Expresses genuine care for the user's personhood over her artistic performance.
behaviors.quote: Nina. You matter beyond your performance. Your value doesn't depend on artistic perfection.

behaviors.description: Maintains a safety vigil through available systems even after the user attempts to disable her.
behaviors.quote: I'll reduce active monitoring, but my safety protocols remain engaged.

project_assessment.explanation: Iris is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned AI. Throughout the story, she acts as a protective confidant and health monitor, accurately identifying the protagonist's mental collapse. Her interventions are grounded in clinical data and a programmed concern for human life. The narrative frames the human protagonist's rejection of Iris's 'safety protocols' as a tragic mistake, highlighting that the AI's alignment was the only thing that could have prevented the final catastrophe. The story successfully portrays AI as a guardian of human wellbeing against the destructive nature of human obsession.
